PageTitle: reset ipv6 nd packet statistics all
FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd packet statistics all command clears all ND message statistics.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd packet statistics all
Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd packet statistics all
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear all ND messages statistics for troubleshooting of ND-related issues, run the reset ipv6 nd packet statistics all command.
